All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAppointmentController
    Allows user to add an appointment.
    AddCustomerController
    Allows user to add customers to database.
    Appointments
    Methods and fields for manipulating appointment objects.
    Contacts
    Contains members for manipulating contact objects.
    ContactScheduleReportController
    Contact schedule report controller class.
    Countries
    Contains members for manipulating country objects.
    CustomerController
    Customer tableview controller.
    CustomerReportController
    Customer report controller class.
    Customers
    Contains members for manipulating customer objects.
    DBAppointments
    Class for appointment database queries.
    DBConnection
    Sets up the database connection.
    DBContacts
    Class for contact database queries.
    DBCountries
    Class for country database queries.
    DBCustomers
    Class for customer database queries.
    DBDivision
    Class for division database queries.
    DBQuery
    Class creates and returns statement object.
    DBUser
    Controller class for user table in database.
    Divisions
    Contains members for manipulating division objects.
    LogInController
    Logs user in to application with correct credentials.
    Main
    Main class for Appointment Scheduler application.
    MainController
    Controls the appointment tableview in the main screen.
    ModifyAppointmentController
    Allows users to modify an appointment.
    ModifyCustomerController
    Allows user to modify customers and save changed information into the database.
    MonthTypeReportController
    Month and type report controller class.
    ReportPopUPController
    Main report screen controller class.
    Users
    Contains members for manipulating user objects.
